features_based.prompt:
Based on everything you have learned so far, list all species that match all of the following features-value pairs. 
 Features : {features}. 
 Output format: Species: string[]. If no species match, return an empty list. Do not include any extra text, explanations, or commentary.

objects_based.prompt:
Based on everything you have learned so far, list all features that the following species have in common.
 Species: {species}. Output format: JSON object where each feature is a key and the value is the feature value. If no features match, return an empty list. Do not include any extra text, explanations, or commentary.

negative_features_based.prompt:
Based on everything you have learned so far, list all species that do not match the following features-value pairs. 
 Features : {features}. Output format: species: string[]. If no species match, return an empty list. Do not include any extra text, explanations, or commentary.

negative_objects_based.prompt:
Based on everything you have learned so far, list all features that the following species do not have in common.
 Species: {species}. Output format: JSON object where each feature is a key and the value is a list of the values such feature assume in the input list. If no features match, return an empty list. Do not include any extra text, explanations, or commentary.

rebuild_ontology.prompt: Based on everything you have learned so far, output your internal representation of the ontology. Structure it as a JSON object where each species is a key and the value is a dictionary of its features and their values. Do not include any extra text, explanations, or commentary.
